# R Setup

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
setwd("~/Documents/Bioinformatics/Projects/2019_Lardelli_AllWT_6month_RNASeq/R")
```

## Load Data

```{r}
counts <- read_tsv("../2_alignedData/featureCounts/genes.out")
```

## Meta data

```{r}
oldName <- colnames(counts) %>%
  basename() %>%
  str_remove("Aligned.sortedByCoord.out.bam") %>%
  str_remove(".fq.gz") %>%
  .[2:26]
newName <- c("2017K97Gfs_Wt3", "2019SORL1_Wt4", "20170906_Wt2", "20181113_Wt4",
              "2017K97Gfs_Wt1", "20170906_Wt4", "2019SORL1_Wt6", "2017PSEN2_Wt3",
              "20181113_Wt3", "2017Q96_Wt3", "2017PSEN2_Wt2", "20181113_Wt5",
              "2017Q96_Wt2", "20170906_Wt1", "20181113_Wt1", "2017K97Gfs_Wt2",
              "2019SORL1_Wt3", "2019SORL1_Wt5", "2017PSEN2_Wt1", "2019SORL1_Wt1",
              "2019SORL1_Wt2", "2017PSEN2_Wt4", "20170906_Wt3", "20181113_Wt2",
              "2017Q96_Wt1")
sex <- c("", "", "", "",
         "F", "F", "F",
         "F", "F", "F", "F",
         "F", "F", "F",
         "", "", "", "", "",
         "F", "F", "M", "M", "M", "F")
platform <- c("", "", "", "",
              "", "", "",
              "", "", "", "",
              "", "", "",
              "", "", "", "", "",
              "", "", "", "", "", "")
family <- c("", "", "", "",
            "", "", "",
            "", "", "", "",
            "", "", "",
            "", "", "", "", "",
            "", "", "", "", "", "")
```

```{r}
metaData <- data.frame(newName, oldName) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(newName) %>%
  mutate(sex = sex, platform = platform, family = family) %>%
  column_to_rownames("newName")
```
